title: Wobbling exoplanet hints at a hidden exomoon so massive it could redefine the word 'moon' altogether
description: "In our solar system, the most massive moon is Ganymede, which is still extremely small compared to what we are inferring here."
content: "In our solar system, the most massive moon is Ganymede, which is still extremely small compared to what we are inferring here."
